About Me

"First, solve the problem. Then, write the code." - John Johnson

Hello, I am Jordan Schaefer, an ambitious Software Engineer looking to pursue knowledge and success. My drive and passion come from a long history within sales and entrepreneurship.

My experience in coding involves both working within a team and on solo projects with a primary focus on JavaScript, React.js, jQuery, Node.js, SQL, HTML and CSS. Over the last few years, I have gained skills using Git/GitHub, npm, Webpack and MeisterTask. It is very important to me that I continue to better my understanding of these technologies which is why I am actively seeking projects and practice.

Long term, I am looking to foster mutually beneficial relationships with people and the companies they work for. As a passionate and driven developer, I know that I am an asset that will greatly contribute to your team.

Contact info

Copyright © Jordan Lee Schaefer 2020

Welcome to Jobify

A full stack web application where you can search for jobs, save favorite jobs, track progrees you have made on your job hunt and schedule interviews/follow ups. This was a passion project of mine as I entered the job hunt and wanted to create an application to assist me in the process.

Welcome to Wicked Sales

A mobile first shopping cart web application where users can find hot deals on great items. This was created with React.js in the front end, Node.js as the server and PostgrSQL for database management.

Welcome to Rick and Morty

A dynamic web application that utilizes the Rick and Morty API along with the spaceX API. As someone who loves both Rick and Morty and spaceX, I wanted to make a fun web application to team them up and see if you can select a character, a capsule and a planet to destroy. By using the information provided by the API's and odds of chance, I created an algorithm to determine if the user selected a suitable means to destroy the planet.
